teaser: Raging fires in Colorado have displaced thousands and the financial effects are just beginning to surface. We have tips on preparing your finances for a natural disaster. And we talk to a photographer who asked, "What would you take from your burning house?" Plus, need a reason to ditch your office chair? The benefits of standing at your desk. We also drop in on a fourth-grade economics lesson taught by high school students. And we look at how you define financial independence.
title: Marketplace Money for Friday, June 29, 2012
byline: Tess Vigeland, Scott Carrier, Eve Troeh and Karen Burkett
